title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 517.9 - Transportation of patient
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 517.9 - Transportation of patient

State Regulations
(a) Unless
otherwise agreed to by both hospitals, transportation of the patient between
the sending and receiving hospitals shall be provided by the sending hospital
or by the patient's significant others. Before permitting significant others to
transport the patient, the sending hospital shall consult with the patient and
shall determine that there are no contraindications to granting such
permission. (b) A female patient
transported pursuant to subdivision (a) of this section must be accompanied by
another female or the patient's father, brother, husband or son. Notes

517.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
